function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Integrating point-of-care diagnostics for self-testing of COVID-19 patients in isolation","Impact":"Increased risk of inaccurate test results and potential spread of the disease due to lack of professional oversight","Mitigation":"Ensure proper training and guidance for self-testing, and have a system for remote professional oversight","Technologies":"Point-of-care diagnostic tools with remote monitoring capabilities","People":"COVID-19 patients in isolation","Owner":"Healthcare professionals and administrators"},{"Description":"Limited access to a large COVID-19 dataset for training and testing AI models","Impact":"Reduced accuracy and effectiveness of AI models in managing COVID-19 data and outcomes","Mitigation":"Collaborate with institutions to access diverse and comprehensive COVID-19 datasets for model training","Technologies":"Data sharing platforms and collaboration tools","People":"Data scientists, healthcare researchers","Owner":"Data science and research institutions"},{"Description":"Lack of awareness about the potential of blockchain in health systems","Impact":"Missed opportunities to leverage blockchain for secure and efficient health data management","Mitigation":"Education and awareness campaigns about the benefits of blockchain in health systems","Technologies":"Educational materials, training programs","People":"Healthcare administrators, policymakers","Owner":"Healthcare organizations and government institutions"}]}
